panels.title: Fix: mobile calls stuck after first message
panels.scene: A massive ghost labeled '=== final' haunts an entire village, freezing everyone in place. Knight crosses out 6 characters on a tiny scroll and writes 6 new ones. Ghost explodes into sparkles.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: The curse is lifted! Our phones work again!

panels.title: Add contact page and link from landing page footers
panels.scene: A majestic new footpath made of golden bricks leads to a shiny new Contact Page castle. Villagers dance down the path. One villager tosses flowers, another juggles scrolls marked 'Contact Us.'

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: We can now reach the KINGDOM anytime!

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: It’s just a link in the footer.

panels.title: Fix phase name display and balance unmatched quotes in tips
panels.scene: A little gremlin labeled 'Unmatched Quotes' juggles unbalanced quotation marks in the middle of a town square. The Knight calmly ties them up. Gleeful kids run around with balanced phrases.

panels.title: 5 commits. 2 bugs fixed. 3 features added.
panels.scene: Knight sitting exhausted in a wooden chair. Background: villagers building a golden statue of the knight. One holds a chisel, others hang celebratory banners. Kids play with toy knights.
